subject: Sexual Harassment
Football
Stadiums and Arenas
organizations: New Jersey Sports and Exposition Authority
lead_paragraph: A tradition of halftime harassment at Jets home games ended Sunday when the sale of alcohol was banned and access to the two spiral ramps at Gate D was blocked.
snippet: A tradition of halftime harassment at Jets home games ended Sunday when the sale of alcohol was banned and access to the two spiral ramps at Gate D was blocked.
